title: Pilot study shows stable insulin production in type 1 diabetes
funder: Barndiabetesfonden, Diabetesfonden, Medical Research Council of Southeast Sweden, Diamyd Medical
description: A small pilot study in which researchers attempted to slow attacks mounted by the immune system on insulin-producing cells in type 1 diabetes has given promising results. The study by researchers at Linköping University in Sweden has been published in the scientific journal New England Journal of Medicine.
